original_title: Litro Gas to reduce gas prices
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas will reduce prices of domestic gas cylinders from midnight on Sunday (04).
The new price of a 12.5kg gas cylinder will be Rs.3,186 (down by Rs.452).
A 5kg gas cylinder will be priced at Rs.1,281 (down by Rs.181).
The revised price of a 2.5kg gas cylinder is Rs.598 (down by Rs.83).
